rows.label: tlk44300184_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I used to run a shop here. Alas,
things took a turn for the worse
and I had to close down.

rows.label: tlk44300184_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Some Nopon from Avaritia came,
asked me if I wouldn't come set up
and sell my wares there.

rows.label: tlk44300184_02_msg0003
rows.name:
That black market isn't going to last
forever, so I'm thinking I might take
them up on that offer.

rows.label: tlk44300184_02_msg0004
rows.name:
But now... What kind of shop
should I run? Oh, the possibilities!
